title: Star Guardian Lulu (Skin Concept Work In Progress) FAN ART!
body:
So I thought It would be fun to design a Star Guardian skin for Lulu because she's so cute and I love her and yeah.

This is still a work in progress, I have to draw her staff and add some finishing touches but I wanted to show it off so far! :D

replies.body: Woo! Chibiusa! And Luna could totally be the Polymorph.
